data.prayer: Spirit, help the 320 believers find a person of peace today among the 6,881 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vestfirðir, Iceland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Vestfirðir, Iceland that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Over 9.72 percent of the people of Vestfirðir are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Jesus, please help the 320 believers in the state of Vestfirðir to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, general people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Vestfirðir who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Please, teach the 320 believers in Vestfirðir, Iceland how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vestfirðir, Iceland has a population of 7,200.

We estimate Vestfirðir has 320 people who might know Jesus, 6,181 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 700 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Vestfirðir unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
